detectors.description:
SilentSwapToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SilentSwapToken.sol#1281-1297) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SilentSwapToken.sol#1290)
detectors.markdown:
[SilentSwapToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SilentSwapToken.sol#L1281-L1297) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SilentSwapToken.sol#L1290)
